de.uniba.wiai.kinf.lehre.ma13.model.interfaces

Interface IOrderedObject

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBackgroundImage, IGeometry, ILayer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackgroundImage, Layer, OrderedObject, Polygon

    public interface IOrderedObject
    ordered object interface, contains all the methods for the generic attributes
    Author:
    denis
